column1: Smoque BBQ////This place is awesome. I love BBQ but try not to eat it too often. so when i do
column2: i want it to be great and this place hits the mark. We ordered for a big group so i got to taste almost everything. The brisket
column4: chicken are all good. My favorite was the brisket. The ribs are great too although they have too much sauce for me. i like the dry rub rib style.
